attributes.action: limit the outrageous mark-ups that restaurants currently allowed with wine-lists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a scandal that leisure/cultural pursuits are so expensive in London.  Without a shadow of doubt, one of the most guilty is the criminal mark-ups that restaurants are allowed to the sale of wines.  Bottles of £3.99 wine should not be allowed to be resold at £20.00 - unlike most politicans - many of us actually have to foot the bill themselves
